thread.title: Video Of Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield Running From Police And Getting Tackled By Cop Has Been Released And It’s Hilarious
thread.title_full: Video Of Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield Running From Police And Getting Tackled By Cop Has Been Released And It’s Hilarious

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Video Of Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield Running From Police And Getting Tackled By Cop Has Been Released And It’s Hilarious
text:
Last month, Oklahoma Mayfield was picked up for public intoxication and cited for misdemeanor disorderly conduct, misdemeanor fleeing the scene, and misdemeanor resisting arrest. 
We now have video of the incident and the police officer who was able to catch up to Mayfield should probably get signed by an NFL team for his perfect form tackle. 
Here's the Baker Mayfield arrest video. Nice wrap up by the wall. pic.twitter.com/VOEFZj0D88 
— Bunkie Perkins (@BunkiePerkins) March 10, 2017 

Gonna need better speed than that if you wanted get drafted in the first round Baker Mayfield.
